messages.content: Earlier this year, I left the Conservative Party because it had shifted beyond recognition. It is now in the grip of its right-wing and has no room for moderate views. It has also abandoned any serious commitment to tackling burning injustices. I just couldn’t stay with the Conservative Party.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Relentless determination to push ahead with Brexit, no matter what the cost, has divided the country and put so much at risk.
Urgent problems like climate change, widening inequality, the lack of affordable housing and our overstretched NHS have been neglected.
Lack of affordable housing and our overstretched NHS have been neglected.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The local and European elections showed that people are ready to get behind the most consistent, credible, leading Remain party force in British politics - the Liberal Democrats.

issues.brexitEurope: Its relentless determination to push ahead with Brexit, no matter what the cost, has divided the country and put so much at risk.

leaflet.personalStatement: Earlier this year, I left the Conservative Party because it had shifted beyond recognition. It is now in the grip of its right-wing and has no room for moderate views. It has also abandoned any serious commitment to tackling burning injustices. I just couldn’t stay with the Conservative Party.
